comments.body: Could you add a TODO for me to revert these changes once sandboxing is enabled for all builds?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +56,60 @@# TODO(gunan): remove extra flags once sandboxing is enabled for all builds.
echo "========== Building TensorFlow Android Jar and Demo =========="
bazel --bazelrc=/dev/null build -c opt --fat_apk_cpu=${CPUS} \
    --spawn_strategy=sandboxed --genrule_strategy=sandboxed \
    //tensorflow/contrib/android:android_tensorflow_inference_java \
